comments.body: Document the format of the returned data-- I take it it's just a string in the same format as the json output?

I believe the godoc in the IDL covers it, but if not I will add.

On May 16, 2016, at 7:35 PM, Daniel Smith notifications@github.com wrote:

In pkg/api/resource/quantity_proto.go
https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/25243#discussion_r63444003:

> -// ProtoTime returns the Time as a new ProtoTime value.
> -func (q *Quantity) QuantityProto() *QuantityProto {
> - if q == nil {
> -     return &QuantityProto{}
>   +func (m *Quantity) Marshal() (data []byte, err error) {

Document the format of the returned data-- I take it it's just a string in
the same format as the json output?

https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/25243/files/2a61025932c283f19dcc4e003cc623c57cea71e0#r63444003
maybe make this name reasonable, since it's unlikely we'll be rerunning the code generator?

rest of our proto.  But I can.
